籸字的基本解释

籸
shēn
同“糁2”。

籸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shēn］
［《廣韻》所臻切，平臻，生。］
亦作“籶1”。
(1)粉滓；麻子（即芝麻）榨油后之枯滓。元许有壬有《籸麴》诗。
(2)凝结的粥块。

籸字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【米字部】　籸； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页906第38
【廣韻】所臻切【集韻】疏臻切【韻會】疏仁切，?音莘。粉滓也。一曰粥凝。　又【歲時雜記】除夕作蕡燭，以麻籸濃油如庭燎。律有元日油籸之文，今籸盆是也。【月令通攷】除日送舊神，焚松柴，謂之籸盆。

籸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
籸字的起名意思

暂无。

residue of oil making
Basic explanation of words
residue of oil making
shēn
Same as "Grizzle 2".
residue of oil making
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shēn]
["Guangyun" is perfected, leveled, and born. ]
Also known as "籶1".
(1) Fenchao; pockmark (ie, sesame) is dried after oil extraction. Yuan Xu Youren has the poem "Xiyu".
(2) Congealed porridge.
residue of oil making
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Mi Zi Department] 　籸; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 906 Page 38
[Guangyun] So Zhenqie 【Jiyun】Sparse Zhenqie 【Yunhui】Sparse benevolence,? Yinxin. Fan Chu also. One said porridge.　[Miscellaneous Notes on New Year's Eve] As a candle on New Year’s Eve, the thick oil of hemp is like a fire in the garden. The law has the text of the Yuan Ri oil 籸, and it is also the present 籸pen. 【Yuelingtongkao】Except for the day to send the old gods, burn pine firewood, which is called a pot of water.
